text:
June 27, 1956
Miss Anna L. Hyer
Associate Executive Secretary-
Department of Audio-Visual Instruction
National Education /ssociation
1201 Sixteenth Street Northwest
Washington 6, D. G.
Dear Ann:
Thank you for your letter of June 25 requesting a complete listing of
our available programs.
Unfortunately, due to the nature of our operation, we do not retain a
listing of programs such as your catalog for the National Tape Repository.
However, we do have a list for office purposes, and I am enclosing a
copy of it for your use. As you will see by the "Erased" after many
series, we do not have masters of all programs. Also, the "S" proceedÂ¬
ing certain serial numbers means that series is an in-school production.
If you wish further information (such as originating stations, etc.) about
any series, please contact me. I hope this will be of help to you.
Sincerely,
Robert E. Underwood, Jr.
Network Manager
REUiwc
Ehc.
